org.jasig.cas.adaptors.radius

Class JRadiusServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.adaptors.radius.JRadiusServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RadiusServer

    public final class JRadiusServerImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements RadiusServer
    Implementation of a RadiusServer that utilizes the JRadius packages available at http://jradius.sf.net.
    Since:
    3.1

      • authenticate

        public RadiusResponse authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                          java.lang.String password)
                            throws PreventedException
        Description copied from interface: RadiusServer
        Method to authenticate a set of credentials.
        Specified by:
        authenticate in interface RadiusServer
        Parameters:
        username - Non-null username to authenticate.
        password - Password to authenticate.
        Returns:
        RadiusResponse on success, null otherwise.
        Throws:
        PreventedException - On indeterminate case where authentication was prevented by a system (e.g. IO) error.
